top_categories.workout_context: 75 miles on coastal plain gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder's coastal plain gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder's Coastal plain gravel, Holly Shelter Game Land forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 75 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before March.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder. Train it until it feels boring.
When someone attacks on coastal plain gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Base fitness for Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
At Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
The aerobic base that lets you ride coastal plain gravel at tempo for 75 miles without cracking. No shortcuts.
Long rides with hard efforts mixed in. Simulates what Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder's coastal plain gravel actually does to you.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on coastal plain gravel to build confidence. Expect: coastal plain gravel, holly shelter game land, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 75 miles of coastal plain gravel in Southeast North Carolina (Holly Shelter Game Land).
